alert.note: Alert for Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ware, central Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Argyle to 6 miles southeast of Homerville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Homerville, Argyle, Boggy Bay, Manor, Braganza and Needham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
